Last_Recharge.LoadingTitle: We're having trouble confirming your details
Last_Recharge.legacyPlanAlert: If you choose to recharge on any of these plans, you won’t be able to return to your current plan. You can however continue to recharge on any of these new plans.
Last_Recharge.grandFatherPlanAlert: Your current plan is no longer available. Please choose from one of our new plans.
Last_Recharge.legacyPlanAlertRP: If you choose to recharge on this plan, you won’t be able to return to your current plan. You can however continue to recharge on this new plan.

Select_Recharge_Type.content: With MyMix you can choose your own recharge inclusions. As the value of your voucher is fixed there will be limited choices available.
Select_Recharge_Type.anotherContent: You’ll be able to get the most out of MyMix by using a credit card or PayPal.

Express_Recharge.attemptsError: You've made too many attempts. Please call us on 1300 650 410 for help with your one-time code.
Express_Recharge.expressSecondHeading: To recharge a prepaid service, enter the mobile number that you want to recharge.
Express_Recharge.expressSecondHead: To recharge your prepaid service, enter the mobile number that you want to recharge.
Express_Recharge.bonusDataContent: When you recharge with a credit card online. Data in Oz. T&C apply.
Express_Recharge.bonusDataContentInOz: In Oz when you recharge with a credit card online. T&C apply.
Express_Recharge.voucherErrMsg: This offer is no longer available. For help, call 1555 free from your vodafone mobile or 1300 650 410 from another phone (standard call rates apply).
Express_Recharge.addonTopupVoucherErr: This offer is no longer available. For help,call 1555 from your Vodafone mobile or 1300 852 410 (standard call rates apply).
Express_Recharge.rechargeTopupVoucherErr: The value of this voucher can’t be used to top up your My Credit. However, you can still use this voucher to recharge your service.
Express_Recharge.inSufficientErrMsg: You don’t have enough My Credit to complete this purchase. Please top up your My Credit with
Express_Recharge.insufficientTopupVoucherErr: The voucher amount must match the amount you select to top up your My Credit. Please select a different payment option.
Express_Recharge.walletNotEnabled: We've just had a technical mishap with your account. Give it another go or call us on 1555 from your Vodafone mobile or 1300 650 410 from other phones.
Express_Recharge.addedCreditMsg: has been added to your My Credit balance.

Landing_RechargeMBB.creditOrPaypal: Use a Credit card or PayPal

Landing_Recharge.comboSub: Loaded with data to access internet.
Landing_Recharge.comboSubInternational: Loaded with international standard minutes to call selected countries.
Landing_Recharge.comboSubPrepaid: Access our great prepaid rates over a year.

Maintenance.maintenanceHeader: We’re sorry - My Vodafone is currently unavailable.
Maintenance.maintenanceError: Our team are working on fixing the technical issue. Please try again later.

My_Mix_Selector.description: Unfortunately, your financial provider has declined your payment. Please try another card or choose another payment option.
My_Mix_Selector.transactionMsg: Your payment has not gone through
My_Mix_Selector.msg: Your new balance will be updated in few minutes
My_Mix_Selector.inclusion: Excludes premium services. All for use in Australia.
My_Mix_Selector.myMixErrorMsg: This combination is not available for the value of your voucher. Please reselect and try again.
My_Mix_Selector.standardInternationalMins: Standard international minutes to selected countries

Review_And_Pay.PrepaidCCUpdationListdescription: Please try another card or choose another payment option.
Review_And_Pay.prepaidCCUpdationListTransactionMsg: Your payment has not gone through
Review_And_Pay.walletSubmissionDetailsDescription: Unfortunately, your financial provider has declined your payment. Please try another card or choose another payment option.
Review_And_Pay.restartLabel: Please restart your phone to use your Recharge.
Review_And_Pay.walletLoadingDescription: Your new balance will be updated in few minutes.
Review_And_Pay.ccUpdationFailed: Sorry, we were unable to save your credit card this time. This credit card is already linked to another account. You’ll need to unlink your card in My Vodafone before you can add it to this account.
Review_And_Pay.paymentOptionHeader: How would you like to pay?
Review_And_Pay.addonSuccessfulMsg: Please restart your phone to use your Add-on.
Review_And_Pay.rechargeText: For quick and secure future recharges online and by TXT.
Review_And_Pay.authorizationMsg: I authorise Vodafone to charge my nominated credit card and have read and agreed to the terms and conditions.
Review_And_Pay.fallbackErrorMsg: Our payment system is currently unavailable. However, you can pay with a credit or debit card through PayPal. You can either login to PayPal or continue as a PayPal guest.
Review_And_Pay.helpText: Please try again later or call us on 1555 from your Vodafone mobile or 1300 650 410 from any phone.
Review_And_Pay.paypalAccount: Top up using your PayPal account
Review_And_Pay.differentPaymentMethodTxt: We couldn’t complete your recharge. Please try again using a different payment method
Review_And_Pay.topUpUsingYourPayPalAccount: Top up using your PayPal account

Add_On_Review.alertRoamingAddonMsg: To use Roaming Add-ons, activate roaming in My Vodafone through account settings. Once you’ve purchased the Add-on, you can use it immediately however the expiry period will begin from midnight AEST.

LoginWith_OTP_Password.heading: Login with one-time code
LoginWith_OTP_Password.alertMessage: We’ve sent you an SMS with a one-time code to
LoginWith_OTP_Password.getOTPText: We’ve re-sent you an SMS with a one-time code to
LoginWith_OTP_Password.alertSubMessage: If your code doesn't arrive within 2 minutes, please get a new code.

Topup_My_Credit.unsuccessfulMsg: . Please try another card or choose another payment option.
Topup_My_Credit.walletSuccessMsg: My Credit has been successfully added to your account.
Topup_My_Credit.showRestartMsg: Please restart your phone to use your Add-on.
Topup_My_Credit.savedExCCLabel: Confirm the last four digits and expiry date
Topup_My_Credit.savedExCCNumber: Enter the last 4 digits of your card
Topup_My_Credit.myCreditDescription: will be deducted from My Credit to pay for this recharge.
Topup_My_Credit.payPalMsg: You'll be temporarily taken to the PayPal website.

Error_handler.errorDetails: We want you to find what you’re looking for. Head to the dashboard or go back to the previous page.
Error_handler.loginDescription: Login to My Vodafone with your username and password
Error_handler.errorHeading: You don’t have access to this page
Error_handler.errorMessage: This offer is no longer available
Error_handler.helpMessage: Please try again later or call us on 1555 from your Vodafone mobile or 1300 650 410 from any phone.
Error_handler.errorHeadingOverlay: Unfortunately we couldn't process your payment.
Error_handler.errorMessageOverlay: Please use another recharge payment option, or call us on 1555 from your Vodafone mobile or 1300 650 410 from any phone.
Error_handler.validateNumber: Sorry we couldn’t validate your number. Please check the number and try again.

Loading_page.creditBalanceText: Your new My Credit balance is $
Loading_page.remCreditBalText: Your remaining My Credit balance is $
Loading_page.addOnPurchasedText: You have purchased an Add-on for
Loading_page.myCreditPrepaid365Content: By topping up your My Credit Balance you’re joining a Prepaid 365 Plus Plan for 365 days.
Loading_page.myCreditAddonPurchaseDesc: You can use your My Credit to purchase Add-ons or other prepaid recharge plans.
Loading_page.myCreditWalletDescription: When you run out of other inclusions My Credit will be used to make calls, use data and send texts in Australia at pay as you go rates, unless you have purchased a MyMix or Combo recharge. If you purchase a MyMix or Combo recharge, you will not be able to use My Credit for data, except when you’re roaming in selected countries.
Loading_page.myCreditWalletSupportMsg: Our My Credit support page has more information.
